item.description:
All,

Last week was great.

Administrative:
We have to change the time we play this week due to the Cambridge Girls Soccer team playing a game.

Please note that we'll probably start playing at 5pm, but I'm going to show up at 430 in case the field opens up earlier.

Information:
We are a group of people interested in playing flag football. Some for fun, some for exercise, and some for meeting new people. We play to have fun, and all are welcome to join us.

We play on a turf field located very close to the Alewife T Stop (redline). If travelling by T, get off the redline at the Alewife stop, and follow signs to Rindge Ave. Look for stadium lights, grand stands, and a turf field after crossing the Alewife Brook Pkwy.

Hope to see you all there,

-Frank
item.how_to_find_us: Ex: I'll be the guy in the back with a Meetup t-shirt
item.name: 430 PM - FLAG FOOTBALL - SAT - RUSSELL FIELD
